hopobject.name: BeagleKiosk
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1 Iceweasel/7.0.1
hopobject.body:
This project serves as a basis for different purposes:
- It is possible to have a dedicated machine only for Web surfin. Suitable for museums, cafes, academies, and other public services.
- Learn more about Linux and how to build your own distributions. It's time to step to the next level...
- Internet. 0 to 6 seconds from cold boot. Stop.
- Another good reason to buy a BeagleBoardXM, of course :-)
- To proove we're living in the age of Internet and Cloud Computing.
This project is always looking for developers and testers Join us anytime!.
hopobject.shortdesc: Internet Kiosk based on WebConverger Linux distro, ported to the BeagleBoard.
